Huining county in Baiyin 白銀|白银[Bai2 yin2], Gansu

sentences.english: Sometimes they even prefer the presence of that object to the presence of a parent.
sentences.chinese: 他们有时甚至会宁要这个物件也不要父母相陪。

sentences.english: Ning will be based on rain-fed agriculture and agriculture-based county.
sentences.chinese: 会宁是以雨养农业为主的农业县。

sentences.english: Why can the impoverished and education "coexist" wonderfully like this in Huining?
sentences.chinese: 在会宁，贫困与教育为何能如此神奇地“共生”？

sentences.english: Ning will be in the northwest county of Education.
Whether the phenomenon of Huining education will be "out of date"?
sentences.chinese: 会宁教育现象是否“过时了”？

sentences.english: Ning will be green industrial base.
